snippet: Former Arkansas governor Mike Huckabee made clear Saturday at an industry summit here that he is more of a populist than many of the other would-be Republican presidential hopefuls.
abstract: Former Arkansas governor Mike Huckabee made clear Saturday at an industry summit here that he is more of a populist than many of the other would-be Republican presidential hopefuls.

headline.main: Mike Huckabee Strikes a Populist Tone at Iowa Agriculture Summit
